*|Doctor Evidence Upcoming DOC Search Trainings|*
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, You are invited to a 60-minute training on DOC Search, a new Doctor Evidence technology tool available to all Sanofi colleagues. This easy-to-use advanced medical information search engine can be used to quickly and efficiently evaluate published and publicly available medical information for any topic.
Learn how to search over 29 million articles, including articles indexed from MEDLINE, ClinicalTrials.gov, and RSS feeds to: Monitor and view the most up-to-date literature Conduct business intelligence by viewing recent publication of target drug/molecule, adverse events, and econometric data Monitor new trials, literature, and other sources for safety signals Set queries/signals for surveillance Understand trends in the evidence Identify research gaps Analyze most influential authors by topic-specific expertise SCHEDULE: 3 Oct 2018 | 11 am -12 pm EST | (CHC US and South America) 11 Oct 2018 | 9 am -10 am Central China Time (GMT+8) (CHC Asia) 25 Oct 2018 | 10 am-11 am EST | 4 pm-5 pm CET| (CHC US and Europe)
PLEASE CLICK ON THE DATE OF YOUR CHOICE ABOVE, AND YOU WILL RECEIVE AN OUTLOOK CALENDAR INVITE TO THE EVENT.
This training is also available online in a self-paced format. Self-enroll at https://dre.litmos.com/self-signup/. Enter the code “Sanofi” when you create your account on this sign-up page, and you will automatically be enrolled in the DOC Search course.
Kind Regards,
Nancy Morgan Vice President, Learning and Development 301 Arizona Ave Suite 301 Santa Monica CA 90401 Doctor Evidence
Doctor Evidence (DRE) is a technology and research services company that finds, synthesizes and analyzes information from published sources. We will work with you--at no cost--to create deliverables such as Systematic Literature Reviews, Meta-Analyses, Landscape Analyses, Comparative Safety Assessments, and Regulatory Responses across several therapeutic areas: Cardiovascular, Diabetes, Immunology, Multiple Sclerosis, General Medicines (including Consumer Health), Vaccines and Oncology.
